attributes.action: European referendum today, not jam tomorrow!
attributes.additional_details: The Falkland Islanders have recently voted on their future and the Prime Minister, David Cameron, has indicated that the people are entitled to their vote on the future of their island.  Similarly we, the general British public, have a right to vote for our future in Europe.  Why should this not occur today rather a promise of voting in the next parliament which David Cameron is likely to lose!
